title: Danger Mouse: Full Speed
description: A frenetic arcade racer based on the Danger Mouse animated series. Race through colorful tracks inspired by the show, avoiding obstacles and collecting power-ups. Built with PlayCanvas, this game features cartoon-style 3D graphics, multiple characters from the series, and fast-paced gameplay.
how_to_play: Use arrow keys or WASD to control your vehicle. Collect power-ups to gain advantages and avoid obstacles that slow you down. Race against time or compete with AI opponents across various tracks. Choose your favorite character from the Danger Mouse series, each with their own unique vehicle.
